author: 475renua
title: Outstanding experience
text: We stayed for 6 nights. Loved our room .. 308. Loved the service, concierge was extremely helpful â€” made us many restaurant reservations. Staff was great. Breakfast was really good. Took the bikes and biked to the Louis Vuitton Foundation. A little bit removed from the main sights but very nice neighborhood.
